div.p: The loop goes from iteration number n2 down to and excluding iteration number n1. The loop will exit when the current iteration number is equal to n1. Initially, the variable t is initialized to be 1. In each iteration, the value of t is multiplied with the current iteration number and the result is assigned back to t. Therefore, the result of the program will be n2 * (n2 - 1) * … * (n1 + 1), which can be written as (n1 + 1) * … * (n2 - 1) * n2.
